title: I cant see the "stunned" or "silenced" texts over peoples health bars anymore
body: I cant see the "stunned" or "silenced" texts over peoples health bars anymore does anyone know how to turn it back on in settings i dont know how thank you :)

replies.body: Hi , I would try, click settings cog at top right of client, then click interface on the left pane, then check box show loss of control UI , then scroll to bottom combat text  and check box status. Im not certain this is what you after but it could be.
